title: Jacob Anstey
text:
Jacob Anstey (born 27 January 1978) is a former professional <a href="Australian%20rules%20footballer">Australian rules footballer</a> from the <a href="Australian%20Capital%20Territory">Australian Capital Territory</a> who played for <a href="Carlton%20Football%20Club">Carlton Football Club</a> in the <a href="Australian%20Football%20League">Australian Football League</a> (AFL).
A lightly framed goal sneak originally from <a href="AFL%20Canberra">AFL Canberra</a> club <a href="Tuggeranong%20Hawks%20Football%20Club">Tuggeranong Hawks Football Club</a>, Anstey was taken by Carlton with the 63rd selection in the <a href="1995%20AFL%20draft">1995 AFL draft</a> and made his senior debut in round 7 of the <a href="1997%20AFL%20season">1997 AFL season</a> against <a href="Richmond%20Football%20Club">Richmond Football Club</a> at the <a href="Melbourne%20Cricket%20Ground">Melbourne Cricket Ground</a>, collecting eight disposals in a victorious Carlton side. Anstey kicked his first AFL goal in round 9 against <a href="Fremantle%20Football%20Club">Fremantle</a> and two more in round 15 against <a href="Melbourne%20Football%20Club">Melbourne</a>. He finished the season in the line-up for the round 22 match against Richmond, but in a crucial match to keep their finals hopes alive, Carlton lost to Richmond and Anstey only had two disposals for the match.
Anstey's first match of the <a href="1998%20AFL%20season">1998 AFL season</a> was in the close round 3 loss to <a href="Essendon%20Football%20Club">Essendon Football Club</a> but Anstey played arguably the best game of his career that day in gathering 13 disposals and kicking an important goal. He struggled, however, to establish himself in a Carlton line-up for most of the season. He played his last AFL game in the round 19 loss to Melbourne. In his final season, he played seven games and kicked one goal.
<a href="St%20Kilda%20Football%20Club">St Kilda</a> selected him late in the <a href="1998%20AFL%20draft">1998 AFL draft</a>, but he never managed a senior game for the Saints and was delisted after the <a href="1999%20AFL%20season">1999 AFL season</a>.
